metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3155

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 15 SP5

metadata.Description: When saving or opening an email attachment on macOS, Thunderbird did not set attribute com.apple.quarantine on the received file. If the received file was an application and the user attempted to open it, then the application was started immediately without asking the user to confirm. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 102.3.
